description.p: Key - Noise Control Modes: Easily switch between noise control modes without having to reach out to your AirPods to long - Ear Detection: Controls your music automatically when you put your AirPods in or take them out, and switch to phone speaker when you take them out - Battery Status: Accurate battery levels - Conversational Awareness: Volume automatically lowers when you speak - Hearing Aid: Setup Hearing Aid, even in an unsupported region
